column4: Hi, I just installed a bunch of ubuntu updates and it told me to restart, then it won't boot up. This is the error I get: http://pastebin.com/m45ca1657 I am able to log into my netbook with other kernels but not the one that updated. Anyone know why?
check the boot parameters for each kernel, and make sure they're the same
if the disk UUID is specified the same, that suggests there is a bug in the new kernel's SATA or IDE driver
If that is the case, what do you suggest I do?
